ABOUT US

Who We Are

Adellene Odelia Tanuri

Growing up in Indonesia, Adelle was constantly confronted with the reality of poverty and inequality in the country she calls home. This early exposure planted the seed of her passion to instigate social change, especially through education and financial inclusion. Her holistic experience in the nonprofit, private, and public sector, gave rise to her ambition to create collaborations across the society in order to catalyze social impact. She believes in the potential of innovative solutions like impact investing, financial technology, and social enterprises â€“ where there is a symbiotic relationship between profit and purpose.

Her ambitions are reflected in her leadership experience founding Spark USA, her past involvement in Microfinance at Berkeley, and past work experiences in the Executive Office of the President of Indonesia and an impact investing fund based in the Bay Area called Just Business.
